name: Fatrifice
description:
In order to summon a demon, one girl must stuff herself to be the ultimate fatrifice! Help her expand into new shapes and sizes by feeding her!

FEATURES

  • A cute girl who gains weight.
  • A fun and lovable story.
  • Timed-clicking minigame.
  • Gallery to revisit your favorite moments.
  • Normal and hard difficulties.
  • 2 endings.
  • Censored and uncensored options.
